8 Version Control Best Practices: perforce.com/blog/vcs/8-version-control-best-Practices

1) Commit changes atomically
2) Commmit files with a single purpose - not as a backup
3) Write good commit messages
4) Don't break builds
5) Do reviews before committing to a shared repository 
6) Make sure every commit is traceable 
7) Follow branching best Practices
8) Protect your Assets
